aforce 0.0.2.9000
  • Reference

aforce

3D Virtual Force Directed Graph in R.

Installation

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JohnCoene/aforce")

Example

library(aforce)

data("some_nodes")
data("some_links")

aForce$
  new()$ # initialise
  nodes(some_nodes, id, val, color)$ # add nodes
  links(some_links, source, target)$ # add edges
  build()$ # build
  embed() # get embed tag

Click the link below for a full-screen version.
